mapper.insert: insert into FRESH_RECORD_FC (ID, CATCH_TIME, RIVER_LINK, SECTION_ID, SAMPLING_POINT, FISHING_TYPE, NETTING_SPECIFICATION, CATCH_TOTAL, CATCH_IN_NUMBER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, REPORT_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{riverLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{samplingPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fishingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nettingSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catchTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{catchInNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update FRESH_RECORD_FC set CATCH_TIME = #{catchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RIVER_LINK = #{riverLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLING_POINT = #{samplingPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FISHING_TYPE = #{fishingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NETTING_SPECIFICATION = #{nettingSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATCH_TOTAL = #{catchTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CATCH_IN_NUMBER = #{catchInNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_ID = #{reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, CATCH_TIME, RIVER_LINK, SECTION_ID, SAMPLING_POINT, FISHING_TYPE, NETTING_SPECIFICATION, CATCH_TOTAL, CATCH_IN_NUMBER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, REPORT_ID from FRESH_RECORD_FC where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
